item.description: Okay, it's time for another T-Dance. With catered Barbeque! Yummy..........We had so much fun at the T-Dance in May so I know alot of you will show up for this one and bring your friends! This goes from 3pm until closing time. Smoking for this event will be kept to the outside area. Is there entertainment.....I don't know yet. I will update as soon as I do. Parking is no problem and this venue is very private. Big outdoor space with lots of tables for hanging out and mingling with your friends. Pool table inside and great music too. Sign Up! You late birds who don't make the sign up just come on over!

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Women's T- Dance and Barbeque-Havana House-Northboro
